DOC.brief_title: Green Tea Effect Anthropometric , Oxidation Inflammation Parameters Physically Active vs. Sedentary Elders
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective , crossover trial every individual serve control . All subject undergo four week washout period , brief avoid tea drinking antioxidant supplement end study . At end washout period , blood saliva sample collect 12 hour night fast . Subsequently , subject receive maltodextrin contain placebo `` tea bag '' . The subject instruct brew placebo sachet five minute 240 mL boiling water without stir drink 4 cup per day 12 week period ( placebo period ) . After placebo period , fast sample collect subject receive green tea bag . Preparation drink instruction placebo drink . At end 12 week , green tea drinking , fast blood saliva sample draw third time . During study , every 4 week subject get additional placebo green tea bag . Assessment nutritional consumption macronutrients antioxidant use food diary , physical activity lifestyle well weight , body fat circumference measurement make begin , middle end study .
